title: Best Paper Award at ACM CHI 2024
description: Our paper on Human-AI Collaboration in Crowd-Powered Systems received the Best Paper Award at CHI 2024.

title: Keynote at AAAI HCOMP 2024
description: Delivered a keynote on 'The Future of Human-AI Collaboration in Crowd Computing' at the AAAI Conference on Human Computation.

title: New Horizon Europe Grant Awarded
description: Secured funding for the HUMAN-AI project on Human-Centered Trustworthy AI, a multi-partner Horizon Europe initiative.

title: Interview on Responsible AI for Dutch National Radio
description: Discussed the challenges and opportunities of responsible AI deployment in public services.

title: Elected Fellow of the Netherlands Academy of Engineering
description: Recognized for contributions to engineering sciences and leadership in AI research.

title: Invited Talk at ICWE 2023
description: Presented on 'Crowd-Powered Data Management for the Web' at the International Conference on Web Engineering.
